description: These nutty oat muffins are one of the quickest and easiest bakes to have on hand for busy weeks.
name: Peanut Butter & Banana Oat Muffins Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 140g peanut butter, smooth, no added sugar

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 210째C/190째C fan-forced and line a muffin pan with 12 paper cases.
Add the bananas, peanut butter, eggs, maple syrup and vanilla to a large bowl and mix well. Add the flour and baking powder and gently mix to combine.

Scoop the batter into the muffin cases and bake for 5 minutes, then reduce the heat to 170째C/150째C fan-forced and bake for 15 minutes until lightly golden. Cool for 10 minutes on a wire rack and serve.
